name: Bit Brawl
description:
2-player local multiplayer fighting game with 4 unique brawlers.

Controls: 

R- Restart Game

Backspace - Return to Menu

Player 1 Universal Controls:

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

Tab - Change Character

Player 1 Bandit Controls:

S - Slam

W + W - Double Jump

V - Hold to charge dash attack, hold direction while releasing to dash in that direction

Player 1 Ninja Controls:

C - Dodge

V - Shurikens

Player 1 Boomeranger Controls:

C - Lay Trap

V - Throw Boomerang

Player 1 Wizard Controls: 

C - Shield

V - Ice Ball

B - Fire Ball

Player 2 Universal Keyboard Controls:

Up  Arrow- Jump

Left Arrow - Left

Right Arrow - Right

K - Change Character

Player 2 Bandit Controls:

Down Arrow - Slam

Up Arrow + Up Arrow - Double Jump

; (semicolon) - Hold to charge dash attack, hold direction while releasing to dash in that direction

Player 2 Ninja Controls:

L - Dodge

; (semicolon) - Shurikens

Player 2 Boomeranger Controls:

L - Lay Trap

; (semicolon) - Throw Boomerang

Player 2 Wizard Controls: 

L - Shield

;(semicolon) - Ice Ball

'(quote) - Fire Ball

Universal Controller Controls: 

A- Jump 

Left Stick Left - Left 

Left Stick Right - Right

Left/Right Shoulders - Change Character

Bandit Controller Controls:

Left Stick Down- Slam 

A + A - Double Jump 

B - Hold to charge dash attack, hold direction while releasing to dash in that direction

Ninja Controller Controls: 

X - Dodge 

B - Shurikens

Boomeranger Controller Controls:

 X - Lay Trap 

B- Throw Boomerang

Wizard Controller Controls:  

X - Shield

B- Ice Ball 

Y - Fire Ball
